hero.name: Maria Victoria
hero.content: I'm a backend developer specialized in building robust and scalable RESTful APIs using Python and PostgreSQL. With experience in business process automation, Docker deployment, and CI/CD pipeline integration, I focus on building efficient and well-documented technical solutions that align with business objectives. I work in remote environments with agile methodologies, and I enjoy collaborating with both technical and functional teams to deliver high-quality products.

about.text: Since I was very young, I have been captivated by technology and its ability to transform ideas into useful solutions. As a backend developer, I combine creativity and technical rigor to design clear APIs, automations that simplify flows, and architectures that scale securely. My training in Mathematics from the University of Havana gives me a solid foundation in logic and problem-solving; this, together with my specialization in Python and PostgreSQL and my experience in Docker and RESTful APIs, allows me to deliver efficient, well-documented code aligned with business needs. With two years of professional experience, I have honed my skills with modern tools and frameworks.

experiences.description: RESTful API development in Python with scalability and versioning principles. PostgreSQL database modeling and optimization with advanced queries and stored procedures. Business process automation (sales, accounting, CRM). Environment management with Docker and CI/CD workflow integration with GitHub/Git. Endpoint documentation and automated report generation.

In my role at KBA Air Filters, I developed and customized modules in Odoo using Python, XML, and JavaScript; implemented Sales and Inventory process automation; implemented electronic invoicing; and integrated external APIs. Additionally, I designed real-time dashboards and coordinated directly with clients to gather requirements and deploy customized solutions. I worked with a dedicated team whose collaboration improved daily operations.

projects.title: London-Project
projects.description: El London Project Management System es un módulo desarrollado para Odoo 18 destinado a la gestión integral de proyectos y empleados en la empresa London S.A

projects.title: Analyzing Selling Price of Used Cars
projects.description: This project performs an exploratory data analysis on an Automobile Dataset. The goal is to discover relationships between vehicle features and their price, using data cleaning, visualization, and statistical analysis

projects.title: Six Degrees of Separation
projects.description: This project implements a graph search algorithm to find the minimum number of degrees of separation between two actors in the movie industry. It uses IMDB data to build a graph where actors are nodes and movies are edges, then finds the shortest path between any two actors.
